atlas.controller

Class ImageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlas.controller.BasicController
      • atlas.controller.ImageController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @ViewScoped
 @Named(value="imageController")
public class ImageController
extends BasicController
implements Serializable
    Provides ways to manage images. ViewScoped managed bean, controller for images.xhtml component. Provides methods to manage images and delegate related client requests to service layer. Initializes list of available images post-construct.
    Author:
    Michal Smrha
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageController

        public ImageController()

    • Method Detail

      • upload

        public String upload()
        Uploads a new image file and adds it to the database. File and name are taken from bound properties "imageFile" and "newName". Checks if editor is logged and file is selected. If these checks fail, FacesMessage is set and redirect is null. If all checks pass, file is uploaded and page is reloaded.
        Returns:
        Redirection string.

      • updateImage

        public String updateImage(Image image)
        Updates a database entry of an image. Checks if editor is logged. If this check fails, FacesMessage is set and redirect is null. If all checks pass, entry is updated and redirect reloads page.
        Parameters:
        image - Image entity to be updated.
        Returns:
        Redirection string.

      • removeImage

        public String removeImage(Image image)
        Deletes an image. Deletes both the file and database entry. Checks if editor is logged. Checks that image is not used in any component. If these checks fail, FacesMessage is set and redirect is null. If all checks pass, image is deleted and redirect reloads page.
        Parameters:
        image - Image entity to be removed.
        Returns:
        Redirection string.

      • getAllImages

        public List<Image> getAllImages()
        Returns:
        List of all available Image entities.

      • getImageFile

        public javax.servlet.http.Part getImageFile()
        Returns:
        File of a new Image in form of "Part" instance.

      • setImageFile

        public void setImageFile(javax.servlet.http.Part imageFile)
        Sets the image file to be uploaded by the "upload()" method.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - Image file in form of "Part" instance.

      • getNewName

        public String getNewName()
        Returns:
        Name of a new Image.

      • setNewName

        public void setNewName(String newName)
        Sets the name of the image to be persisted by the "upload()" method.
        Parameters:
        newName - Image name.
